concept.title: Introduction to Mind Engage

audience.otherprops: community engagement officers, project managers, program administrators, public information coordinators, external stakeholders, contractors, agency leadership

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Overview of Mind Engage, a SaaS product that enables infrastructure and construction agencies to manage public engagement, campaigns and stakeholder interactions.

conbody.p: Mind Engage is a software as a service (SaaS) based product that enables infrastructure and construction agencies to efficiently collaborate with general public potentially using a proposed infrastructure. Mind Engage is a reliable full-featured web-based solution to determine general public sentiments on proposed projects. It is designed to collate and analyze general public feedback on potential projects early in the capital planning process. Mind Engage uses robust artificial intelligence (AI) tools to perform powerful analysis on the collated feedback and provides critical insights into user sentiment so agencies can decide on the best approach to the proposed project.

Mind Engage enables agencies to easily create and effectively promote campaigns for proposed capital projects, solicit feedback from potential users of the infrastructure, analyze feedback, acknowledge, and respond to feedback. Mind Engage enables general public to view details of proposed projects in campaigns and voice their opinions on the projects.

Once a campaign with information on the proposed project is created, infrastructure and construction agencies can broadcast and promote these campaigns using social media such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and other media to solicit feedback. Mind Engage then performs powerful sentimental analysis on the feedback received and presents analyzed information efficiently. Based on these effective illustrations of general public sentiment that Mind Engage provides, agencies can now make informed decisions on proposed projects.
Mind Engage involves the following phases:

ol.li: Configure application settings to customize the application.
Personalize the public portal template and theme.
Create a campaign with information on the proposed project.
Create a public portal for the general public to participate in a campaign and share their feedback.
Promote campaigns using social platforms to increase the demographics and user base for augmented user involvement.
Accept, analyze, and respond to the comments from general public for a campaign.
Generate reports based on the sentiments of the comments received from the general public.
